articles.title: Drone Footage Shows Even Killer Whales Have Close 'Friends' - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Drone footage has captured the social lives of southern resident killer whales like never before, and their friendships look surprisingly similar to our own.

articles.title: Hubble findings deepen mystery surrounding galaxy missing dark matter - The Jerusalem Post
articles.description: The search is on for more galaxies lacking dark matter, with more work needed in order to understand how these galaxies formed without dark matter.
